name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alan John ABADIE.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alan John ABADIE.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alan John ABADIE.
No. D-2860.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 7, 2015.
Alan John Abadie, of Chalmette, Louisiana, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
